CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Date_of_Birth__c)), CASE(FLOOR((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c )/365), 0, '', 1, '1 Year', TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c )/365)) &' Years') & ' ' & CASE(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c),365)/30), 0, '', 1, '1 Month', TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c),365)/30)) &' Months'), 'Unknown')
CustomField.label: Age for Adoption Website
